English:
Sorry, but I'm in a hurry. I have a message for
you.
Chinese: 不好意思，我在趕時間……我只說重點。
German:
Entschuldige, aber ich habe es eilig. Ich habe
eine Nachricht für dich.

English:
Suedou said that the weakened Examon will be
heading back there.
Chinese:
末堂他說，
變弱的艾克薩獸要回來了。
Korean:
약해져 버린 엑자몬이 돌아온다고 하더군
스에도가 그렇게 말했어
German:
Suedou meinte, dass das geschwächte Examon dorthin
zurückkehren wird.

English: It's your chance to defeat Examon. Help Suedou.
Chinese: 這是打倒它的好機會，快來幫我。
German:
Das ist deine Chance, Examon zu besiegen.
Hilf Suedou.

English:
Listen up, though. Come alone.
Don't tell Kyoko or anyone else. Just you.
Chinese:
聽好了……你一個人過來。
不准對杏子姊或其他人說，就你一個人過來。
Korean:
…잘 들어, 혼자서 와
쿄코 씨나 다른 녀석들에게도 말하지 마, 댁 혼자서야
German:
Aber hör mal. Komm bitte allein.
Sag Kyoko und den anderen nichts.

English:
I guess Arata's with Suedou after all.
I better meet them and see what they have to say!
Chinese:
新……果然和末堂……
總之，先去和他見面談談吧……！
Korean:
아라타… 역시 스에도와…
어쨌든 만나서 얘기하자…!
German:
Arata gehört also doch zu Suedou.
Ich gehe besser hin und höre ihnen zu!
